challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.story_title: Challenges expected for Novavax' COVID-19 vaccine in USA
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.summary: The story is about the efficacy of the vaccine Novavax and the need to file for regulatory approvals and therefore be able to manufacture more of the drug.
challenges-expected-for-novavax-covid-19.why: It is about the efficacy of the vaccine
